title: US oil plunges below $75 for first time since just before Christmas
description: Oil prices have tumbled to their lowest level of the year as worries about the health of the economy overshadow concerns about new restrictions imposed on Russian energy.

title: Meme stock mania may finally be over
description: It's time to sing a requiem for a meme. Meme stocks, that is. Companies that attracted rabid followings from traders on Reddit and other social media sites in 2021 are struggling. Just look at GameStop.

title: US trade deficit edged up to $78.2 billion in October
description: The US trade gap edged only slightly higher in October than the month before, to $78.2 billion.

title: The last time the US faced a debt fight this bad it lost its AAA rating
description: Democrats and Republicans in Congress are gearing up for yet another political showdown over raising the nation's $31.4 trillion borrowing limit.

title: Indonesia bans sex outside marriage as parliament passes sweeping new criminal code
description: Indonesian lawmakers passed a sweeping new criminal code on Tuesday that criminalizes sex outside marriage, as part of a tranche of changes that critics say threaten human rights and freedoms in the Southeast Asian country.
